title: Ep: 80 Prison Break: Chasing Freedom
itunes:title: Ep: 80 Prison Break: Chasing Freedom
description:
In this special episode of Gangster Chronicles we have the first ever person to escape a maximum security prison not once, but twice Quawntay "Bosco" Adams. From 11 year old drug dealer to a man facing life behind the walls, listen to one man's incredible journey and you will see why some of the world's most brilliant people are on the other side of the law.

To order his book "Chasin' Freedom" visit quawntayboscoadams.com

MAKE SURE YOU SUBSCRIBE, RATE AND LEAVE A COMMENT
